title: Import Epidemiological Data into R
text: next steps R command line. prompted copy edit text terminal (especially launched R terminal using $ R), might Vim. Exit typing :wq, edit files text editor. Populate fields DESCRIPTION NAMESPACE Actually data.table requires bit configuration use many features, := .SD. Use instead: Set unit testing infrastructure Set licence prefer MIT licence, primarily short easy read. Make README page Readme.md can updated manually Readme.Rmd created , using using Github Actions setup (see examples https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v2-branch/examples). Set continuous integration using Github Actions Set documentation Document package required using Set pkgdown website. set Github Actions job using usethis::use_github_action("pkgdown").
code: # e.g. using data.table usethis::use_package("data.table") usethis::use_data_table() usethis::use_testthat()  # and a basic test file usethis::use_test("basic-test")  # code coverage YAML for codecov usethis::use_coverage("codecov") usethis::use_mit_licence() usethis::use_readme_rmd() devtools::build_readme() # to check package installation usethis::use_github_actions_check_standard()  # to report code coverage results to codecov usethis::use_github_action("test-coverage") devtools::document() # configure the pkgdown YAML. # can be saved and edited later usethis::use_pkgdown()  # build the website using pkgdown::build_site()
